com/en/project/2125/10-minute-baby-bird-free-crochet-amigurumi-tutorial the 10-minute baby bird is a completely no-sew amigurumi pattern the beak and feet are crocheted onto its round chubby body use different colors to crochet this tiny stuffed bird into a mallard duck chick/chicken/hen dove or more you can even attach a keyring to the top of its head to turn it into a mini keychain this pattern is designed with super bulky weight chenille velvet yarn but you can use thinner yarns to make a smaller version it s the perfect last-minute gift to whip up for class valentine s day gifts easter eggs or easter baskets or christmas holiday gift or stocking stuffer it s also suitable as a market prep product for craft fairs since it s so fast and easy to make the pdf pattern includes written pattern instructions along with a detailed photo tutorial to guide you through the doll-making process **size** height 1 75 inches 4 5 cm **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn in desired colors i used hobbii honey bunny 5mm crochet hook 7mm plastic safety eyes stuffing scissors **level** ★☆☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together *copyright notice
